name: Little Wing
description:
Embark on a dangerous journey through the wilderness, searching for the Little Wing, who perches atop the Mountain - in this challenging and charming platformer. Brave levels with many dangers, with tight and precise jumping, stamina management and attacks, can you find the Little Wing?

A single-player adventure with charming world and characters, tight platforming ripe for Speedrunning.

Multiple landscapes and difficult levels await, becoming increasingly difficult as you near and ascend the mountain.

The controls are simple with options for Keyboard and Mouse or a Controller. Find your way using: jump, double-jump, and pull up over ledges. Attack enemies using a bow or Tomahawk and gather food to replenish your stamina.

Quick gameplay and respawns keep you engaged and always moving.

Can you make it to the peak of the Little Wing? Good luck, and enjoy the journey.
